column5: Hey everybody, so I'm asking this question for my dad. He want's to take myself and a friend of my choice out on Lake Ontario for a morning or afternoon of Guided Lake Trout fishing. Were not interested in keeping any fish, just want to hear of some good Guides that we can call up.  Share any personal experiences and let me know what prices are like for 3 people.  Thanks, hoping to hear some good feedback.  Thanks, Mike
ME!!! If I wasn't 5,500 kms away.  Pick someone who guides around the Niagara as the bar off the mouth rocks!!!
http://www.wepoundemfishing.com/    Ryan is a great guide and is always on fish!  fully rigged for a great time on the water  Jesse
Thanks for the link and I got your PM.  PM sent
Pm Sent ...Lake Ont Lakers Feed all day Long ...Get ready for some Arm Pounding Fun
